title: Orchard Lodge
details:
A traditional Colonial house recently renovated to a very high spec to meet with today’s demands. The Villa comprises with 3 air conditioned bedrooms, all en-suite with hot water showers, the house sleeps 8 adults very comfortably. Two rooms are built with bunk beds for kids or adults.

There is a modern brand new kitchen, CCTV, fully furnished, Flat screen TV, DVD player, Beautiful Garden, Telephone li, Brand new curtains, Swimming pool, two beautiful ponds, garden lights and many more. Also, a verity of fruit trees and flowers are planted.

Furnished throughout with a blend of antiques and modern furniture and the jogging path is only (200m) away.

The major three supermarkets are located in Enderamulla town which is less than 2 km.

“Orchard Villa” centrally located to travel around the country.

Bandaranaike International Airport (CMB) 31.5KM
